name: NHS England Low Priority Treatment - Aliskiren
title: Aliskiren cost per 1000 patients
why_it_matters: NICE hypertension guidance states there is insufficient
evidence of its effectiveness to determine its suitability for use in resistant hypertension.
Whilst aliskiren has shown comparable efficacy to other antihypertensive agents in terms of blood
pressure reduction, its effects on mortality and long-term morbidity are currently unknown.
